items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Easily view your Salesforce organization's local time with this lightweight Chrome Extension. Ideal for admins, developers, and global teams, it fetches the org's time zone and displays a real-time clock. Simplify workflow alignment, manage schedules, and boost productivity with quick access to your org's time!
items.title: REsron/SFtime: Easily view your Salesforce organization's local time with this lightweight Chrome Extension. Ideal for admins, developers, and global teams, it fetches the org's time zone and displays a real-time clock. Simplify workflow alignment, manage schedules, and boost productivity with quick access to your org's time!
